full_text: Page 840 Re: FW: Jeffrey Epstein From [b(6); (b)(7)(C) To [b(6); (b)(7)(C) Date 2019/08/14 12:02 Subject: Re: FW: Jeffrey Epstein Attachments: TEXT.htm [b(6); (b)(7)(C) Thank you for the below. We greatly appreciate it. I look forward to hearing from Insp [b(6); (b)(7)(C) Please let me know if there is anything else you need from my end. Thanks again, [b(6); (b)(7)(C) Supervisory Staff Attorney CLC New York Metropolitan Correctional Center 150 Park Row New York, New York 10007 p: (646)836 [b(6); (b)(7)(C) f: (646)836-7665 >> [b(6); (b)(7)(C) @pbso.org> 8/14/2019 9:32 AM >>> [b(6); (b)(7)(C) My boss, Sheriff Ric Bradshaw, sent a formal request to Governor Ron DeSantis to have the Florida Department of Law Enforcement (FDLE) to assume the lead role in the administrative review-criminal investigation while Mr. Epstein was under the care and control of the Palm Beach County Sheriff's Office, copies of those requests are attached. I met with part of the FDLE investigative team yesterday and turned over to them the start of our investigation. Below you will find the POC from FDLE and with your permission I'd like to forward your contact information to him if he would need to contact your office. Inspector [b(6); (b)(7)(C) Office of Executive Investigations – FDLE 850-410-8280 [b(6); (b)(7)(C) @fdle.state.fl.us Insp [b(6); (b)(7)(C) should have copies of those records now, I will reach out to him today and with FDLE approval, since they are now the investigative lead, I will facilitate your office in obtaining those records directly from US. I will be back in touch as quickly as possible. [b(6); (b)(7)(C) [b(6); (b)(7)(C) Palm Beach County Sheriff's Office Page 1530 DOJ-OGR-00025151

text_blocks.content: Re: FW: Jeffrey Epstein From [b(6); (b)(7)(C) To [b(6); (b)(7)(C) Date 2019/08/14 12:02 Subject: Re: FW: Jeffrey Epstein Attachments: TEXT.htm

Thank you for the below. We greatly appreciate it. I look forward to hearing from Insp [b(6); (b)(7)(C) Please let me know if there is anything else you need from my end. Thanks again, [b(6); (b)(7)(C)
Supervisory Staff Attorney CLC New York Metropolitan Correctional Center 150 Park Row New York, New York 10007 p: (646)836 [b(6); (b)(7)(C) f: (646)836-7665

My boss, Sheriff Ric Bradshaw, sent a formal request to Governor Ron DeSantis to have the Florida Department of Law Enforcement (FDLE) to assume the lead role in the administrative review-criminal investigation while Mr. Epstein was under the care and control of the Palm Beach County Sheriff's Office, copies of those requests are attached. I met with part of the FDLE investigative team yesterday and turned over to them the start of our investigation. Below you will find the POC from FDLE and with your permission I'd like to forward your contact information to him if he would need to contact your office.
Inspector [b(6); (b)(7)(C) Office of Executive Investigations – FDLE 850-410-8280 [b(6); (b)(7)(C) @fdle.state.fl.us

Insp [b(6); (b)(7)(C) should have copies of those records now, I will reach out to him today and with FDLE approval, since they are now the investigative lead, I will facilitate your office in obtaining those records directly from US. I will be back in touch as quickly as possible.

additional_notes: The document is an email chain discussing the investigation into Jeffrey Epstein. The email contains redactions of personal information.
